Traditional Cookies & Specialties

Gluten and dairy free options are available for many of our cookies. Additional charges may apply — please contact us for specifics.

Traditional Cookies

Enjoy biting into our homemade cookies that have the perfect balance of a crunchy outside, and a soft gooey inside. Gluten and dairy free options available. Additional charges apply.

Classics

  • Chocolate Chip
  • Double Chocolate Chip
  • Oatmeal
  • Snickerdoodle

Holiday

  • Gingerbread Crinkle
  • Vanilla Sugar
  • White Chocolate Chip

$27.00 per dozen

Signature Cookies

Gluten, and dairy free options available. Additional charges apply.

Caramel Apple Cider

Soft and chewy apple cider sugar cookie with real caramel chips. Or ask for it “Stuffed” for a caramel center. Heat it over a fresh hot cup of tea or apple cider for a gooey fall treat.

$27.00 per dozen

Strawberry Haze

Delicious strawberry and cream cheese cookie rolled "pinwheel style".

$30.00 per dozen

Wookie Cookie

A double chocolate chip cookie deep fried in funnel cake batter. Dusted with powdered sugar. Now that's one monster cookie!

$30.00 per dozen

Campfire Cookies

Marshmallows and graham cracker bits inside of a chocolate chip OR double chocolate chip cookie. A soft and gooey treat with no campfire required!

$27.00 per dozen

Biscotti

A deliciously crunchy twice baked biscuit cookie. A perfect component to a hot cup of coffee or tea. Gluten, and dairy free options available. Additional charges apply.

Chocolates

  • Chocolate
  • Triple Chocolate
  • Mocha
  • Chocolate Chip
  • Chocolate Cardamom

Fruit and Spice

  • Vanilla
  • Cinnamon Toffee
  • Lemon
  • Cranberry Orange
  • Mango Ginger

$27.00 per dozen

Macarons

Made with sunflower seed flour instead of traditional almond flour. These French-style sandwich cookies can be filled with a variety of frostings or preserves. Gluten and dairy free options may be available; additional charges may apply.
